Title: Relates to deaths or serious injuries resulting from drivers using mobile telephones or portable electronic devices while driving
Summary: Includes deaths caused by drivers using mobile telephones or portable electronic devices in vehicular manslaughter in the second degree and includes serious injuries resulting from drivers using mobile telephones or portable electronic devices while driving in vehicular assault in the second degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to making deaths caused by drivers using mobile telephones or portable electronic devices while driving vehicular manslaughter in the second degree and making serious injuries caused by drivers using mobile telephones or portable electronic devices while driving vehicular assault in the second degree
